docs.title: 🧠 Blockchain meets AI: The Trust Engine
📅 Summer 2025 | KAIST School of Computing
docs.text: Instructor: Jason Han Credits: 1 | Grading: Pass/Fail Language: English

docs.title: 🎯 Introduction
docs.text: This site is publicly publishing the project analysis reports and term projects of the students in the class “Blockchain meets AI: The Trust Engine”, which was held in the summer semester of 2025 at KAIST. This is a Web3@KAIST class that has been held annually at KAIST since 2023, and this year's class focuses on the intersection of blockchain and AI. The Web3@KAIST class is taught by Prof. Jason Han, a longtime serial entrepreneur in the tech space.

docs.title: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Community-based Learning
docs.text: Rather than a one-sided lecture by the professor, students research and analyze projects and publish reports. The goal is to share and discuss the report with students in class so that they can learn from each other and deepen their understanding. The results are not only shared in class, but also published externally so that students can interact and contribute outside of class.

docs.title: 📂 30+ Curated AI+Blockchain Case Studies
docs.text: AI and blockchain technologies have their own strengths and there are many areas where they can synergize. In particular, blockchain is a trust engine that can solve many of AI's problems. We divided the areas where the two technologies can synergize into five categories and selected around six projects from each category. Students will each choose one project, research and analyze it, and publish a markdown report on this site.

docs.title: Week 3 – Crypto SDK & Chain support for AI
docs.text: Project Author Report (EN) Report (KR) GOAT SDK 📄 📄 Coinbase AgentKit 📄 📄 Solana Agent Kit 📄 📄 GOAT Gaming 📄 📄

docs.text: Project Author Report (EN) Report (KR) Sahara AI 📄 📄 Grass ($GRASS) 📄 📄 Bittensor ($TAO) 📄 📄 NATIX ($NATIX) 📄 📄 Render Network ($RENDER) 📄 📄 Yupp 📄 📄 AIOZ ($AIOZ) 📄 📄

docs.title: Week 5 – Stablecoins & Payment rails for AI agents
docs.text: Project Author Report (EN) Report (KR) Halliday 📄 📄 Nevermined 📄 📄 Agent Commerce Kit (ACK) by Catena 📄 📄 Skyfire 📄 📄 0xSplits 📄 📄 Coinbase x402 📄 📄

docs.title: Week 6 – Proof of personhood & identity rails for AI
docs.text: Project Author Report (EN) Report (KR) World ID 📄 📄 Solana Attestation Service 📄 📄 Human Passport 📄 📄 Humanity Protocol 📄 📄 BrightID 📄 📄 Civic 📄 📄

docs.title: Week 7 – AI agent co-ownership and Decentralized AI
docs.text: Project Author Report (EN) Report (KR) Virtuals Protocol ($VIRTUAL) 📄 📄 ElizaOS 📄 📄 Kaito 📄 📄 OLAS 📄 📄 Artificial Superintelligence (ASI) Alliance 📄 📄 Phala Network AI 📄 📄 NANDA: The Internet of AI Agents 📄 📄
